name: Stratus
description:
Stratus is a strategic airship combat game with pirate flair. Fight your way through hostile skies in search of profit, but be wary of enemy pirates or you may become a groundship. Customize your combat methods aboard your vessel (the Grimm Dawn), collect some booty, and send your foes down to Davey Jones' Locker. 

Fly your airship through the skies, shooting down all in your path to claim their gold for your own. Line up your enemies for a broadside, or take them out with a mighty shot from The Grimm Dawn's massive forward mounted cannon. Either way, they'll feel your fury.

You can play Stratus with either a Mouse and Keyboard or Controller, it's up to you!

  • Pitch: W/S or Left Stick Y
  • Yaw: A/D or Left Stick X
  • Speed: R/F or Right/Left Bumper
  • Camera: Mouse Movement or Right Stick
  • Zoom: Scroll or D-Pad Up/Down
  • Fire: Left Mouse or Right Trigger
